survey_name: Online Food Delivery Service Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with online food delivery services, focusing on order accuracy, delivery timeliness, and overall user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use online food delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format for clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you use online food delivery services?

questions.question_text: Which online food delivery platforms have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format with an optional open-ended field for 'Other'.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which online food delivery platforms have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the delivery timeliness of your orders?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the delivery timeliness of your orders?

questions.question_text: Please describe any issues you have encountered with your recent food delivery orders.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text box to capture detailed feedback.

script.question_text: Please describe any issues you have encountered with your recent food delivery orders.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the food delivery service you most frequently use to a friend?
questions.client_notes: Use a Net Promoter Score (NPS) style question to gauge loyalty.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the food delivery service you most frequently use to a friend?
